issue.title: [Python] Add Python 3.6 to Travis CI
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-741](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-741). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We need to make sure the next release of PyArrow works on Python 3.6

comments.body:
